newsitem.title: USA: Mark IV sees Q4 gain from sale of audio unit.
newsitem.headline: Mark IV sees Q4 gain from sale of audio unit.

text.p: Mark IV Industries Inc said Thursday it has agreed to sell its professional audio business, Mark IV Audio, to an affiliate of Greenwich Street Capital Partners Inc for $151.5 million in cash.
The company said it expects to report a fourth quarter gain from the sale, which should close in the fourth quarter.
Mark IV said the audio unit is one of several non-core businesses it is selling in an effort to focus on its core power transmission, fluid transfer and filtration technologies.

The company said it will use proceeds from the sale to pay down bank debt and in the longer term it may use capital from its divestiture program to make acquisitions in its core businesses and/or to repurchase its common stock.
